long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Trendyol product images  easily with this most popular tool!
Click once to save Trendyol images in high quality directly to your computer. Simple and efficient!

⭐ **Getting Started:**

🚀 Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
🛍️ Open your target Trendyol product page.
📸 Click on the Trendyol Image Downloader icon to open it.
📥 Download product images one by one or by variants.
🗂️ Download all images just with one click.
📊 Export images details to Excel.

⭐ **Features:**

🗂️ Download single Images (JPG format)
🖼️ One-Click Download Variant Images (ZIP format)
📑 One-Click Export Variant Details (Excel format, XLSX)
🖱️ One-Click Download All Images (ZIP format)
📊 One-Click Export All Details (Excel format, XLSX)

❓ **Is it free?**
Yes, Trendyol Image Downloader is free to use.

❓ **Why Choose Trendyol Image Downloader?**

⚡ Fast and easy way to download Trendyol product images.
📝 Export product information including titles, SKUs, variants, and URLs directly to Excel.
📈 Perfect for sellers, researchers, and anyone needing to save product details from Trendyol.
